caption.title: Inferred migration graph for African rabies virus and its reflection of the events reconstructed from the MCC tree.
caption.p: (A) Significantly non-zero migration rate using a Bayes factor test. Line thicknesses and the white-red color gradient relate to relative posterior migration rate expectations. (B) Projection of reconstructed migration events. Link heights indicate the relative durations of the branches upon which the inferred migration occurs, while the yellow-magenta color gradient informs the relative age of the transition (older-recent). The maps are based on satellite pictures made available in Google Earth ( http://earth.google.com).
